name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Canyon: AI Job Application and Resume Builder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly apply to jobs with a single click. Canyon automatically fills out job applications and creates resumes for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canyon makes it easy to streamline your job application process, track your progress, and create standout resumes, all in one place.

Features
  • AutoFill Technology: Our extension automatically populates job applications with your information at the click of a button, saving you redundant keystrokes and priceless time.
  • Job Tracking: Keep tabs on every job application you send out. Monitor its progress and use Canyon's interviewing preparation tools to nail that next interview.
  • Resume Builder: Building an impressive resume has never been easier. Our AI-driven resume builder guides you through the process, suggesting improvements and highlighting your strongest assets. Increase the odds of your resume getting noticed by generating a unique resume for each job description.

Canyon works with all the popular job boards (like LinkedIn and Indeed) and ATS systems (Like Greenhouse and Lever), making it fast and easy to track and apply to all your job applications!
